title: Baby Trader
description: Log in for the first time.

title: Ready for Lift Off
description: Purchase a coin for the first time.

title: Diversifying
lesson: Diversifying your portfolio is a good idea.

title: Small Investor
description: Purchase less than $5 worth of a coin.
lesson: It is usually a good idea to start small and evade going "all in" on a coin.

title: Trader Traded
description: Sell a coin a second time.

title: Watchlist Watcher
description: Add a coin to the watchlist.
lesson: The best traders are the ones that monitor the market. The price of one coin may impact the price of another coin.

title: Informed Trader
lesson: Staying informed on coins is a requirement when maximizing profits.

title: Baby Whisperer
description: Have the baby take a nap.
